EXPERIMENTS

Maskenfreiheit - Work in Progress

“Inner Tree” is a VR experience that allows the viewer to explore the different stages of the process of enlightenment. Each person will experience it in a slightly different way. Hopefully, allowing the viewer to reflect on the importance of introspective, spiritual practices, rather than focusing solely on an external search for answers.

Skills

Projection Mapping


Tools

MadMapper, Module8, Adobe Premiere Pro

Symbiosis - Work in Progress

Dreaming of a possible symbiotic relationship between humans and nature, I created Symbiosis. A project where my photographs react to music in real time, mimicking what they hear.

Skills

Photography, VJ


Tools

Module8

Wave Lenghts - Nov 2018

As part of my education at the International Center of Photography, I had to create a short poetic documentary. I used the city of New York the main character, moved only through music and lights.

Skills

Videography, Sound Design


Tools

Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe Audition, DSLR
